name: Freestyle Comfort Oxygen Concentrator
description: Client is has cancer patient and under our palliative care service. She hopes to get this lightweight oxygen concentrator to be able to go out with her family and friends on longer outings as these are precious quality time to her and activities she used to enjoy and really looked forward to in the past as a cancer patient for several years.  She is unable to go out for longer period of time now due to breathlessness and having to be dependent on oxygen machine as the cancer has progressed; currently, she has to bring a portable oxygen tank out which is heavy and can only last for 3 hours (has to be refilled and replaced once oxygen is used up).  This lightweight o2 concentrator can be charged and need not be refilled and replaced. She and family have difficulties affording a light weight oxygen concentrator as it is costly. Hence they are hoping to get it second hand. Refer to https://shop.lifelinecorp.com/products/freestyle-comfort-portable-oxygen-concentrator for reference Kindly contact Amanda at 84282545.

name: Wheelchair
description: This is a family of 9 with 7 school-going children living in a rental flat. Mother had an accident recently on her PMD and broke 2 of her toes. There is a cast over her left leg as well. The wheelchair will be helpful for her upcoming physiotherapy and follow-ups at the hospital.

name: Motorised wheelchair
description:
Client is a terminally ill patient He faces financial difficulties as he is not working and only 1 member of household of 3 is working, another is also ill. Has limited savings. He is hoping for a motorised wheelchair so that he can independently go out on his own, something he is unable to do now without one.

Kindly contact social worker Amanda at 84282545 if keen to donate.

name: Hospital Bed
description:
Client's elderly parent is currently diagnosed with prostate cancer and requires a hospital bed to provide better medical care for father to reduce infection while draining urine. At present, they have limited financial resources to get a hospital bed as they are unemployed due to caregiving duties. 

If you have a suitable item for donation, please drop me a message at 9296 0569, or email me at muhammadsuffian@mws.sg. Thank you

name: Standard Wheelchair
description: Single-parent family with a teenage son with high and special needs. Mother is unable to work due to caregiving requirements. Current wheelchair is too small for son.

name: Handicapped Toilet Seat
description: Client is currently facing financial constrains from house mortgage and hopes for donations of a raised handicapped toilet seat (with installation if necessary).

name: Tilted wheelchair
description:
Spouse is the main caregiver as well as the sole breadwinner to care for client - ADLs independent. Both of them are in their 70s. 

Due to deterioration in condition, client now require a tilted wheelchair for better support and was recommended Wheelchair Model: DNR Wheels Aplus-ATF 30-5/1070/16  - 16

name: New Wheelchair
description:
Client has a medical condition which has prevented her from being able to walk. She moves around at home in a computer chair

Having the wheelchair will allow her to move around the house more easily, and also allow her to get out of the house to run errands when she needs to

name: 20" Wheelchair
description:
15 year old boy just had a fracture and cannot walk, would require wheel chair for the interim. Family is on financial assistance as mother has chronic health conditions like cancer preventing her to work. Client stays at west area and would need donor to cover the delivery of the item to their place in view of their financial situation.

If you have a suitable item for donation, please drop me a message at 9296 0569 or email me at muhammadsuffian@mws.sg

Thank you!

name: Wheelchair
description:
15 year old youth had fractured his leg and family is unable to afford a wheelchair. Looking for a wheelchair for youth to travel more conveniently to and fro, and in school.

Kindly contact social worker at 93623185, thank you.

name: Wheelchair
description:
An elderly resident with mobility issues requires a wheelchair for her daily activities. The current wheelchair that she is using is not working well. Please feel free to reach out if you have a wheelchair to bless.

Thank you!

name: Light Weight Wheelchair
description: Client is a 73 year old elderly who suffers from parkinson's disease. She requires a light weight wheelchair as the current one she has is too heavy which makes it difficult for transferring onto and off taxis when going for medical appointments. Her friend, aged 60+, who takes her to these appointments finds that she is physically less able to handle the weight of her current wheelchair. Hence, a lighter weight simple wheelchair would help to reduce the physical strain on both elderly ladies.

name: Wheelchair (Able to hold 150kg)
description: This client requires the wheelchair and e-scooter as she has limited mobility and multiple health issues. She uses it to get around for medical appointments and to send her son with intellectual disability to school. We would be grateful if donor can pay/provide for delivery.

contact.org: Allkin Singapore's Family Service Centre @ Ang Mo Kio 230

name: Refrigerator
description: Looking for a refrigerator for a client living in a rental unit. She requires this item as her current fridge is beyond repair and is held together by a masking tape

name: Kitchen Items
description: Client (F/23) is a single mother with a son (M/1) with special needs and developmental delays. Client manages between her roles in parenting by bringing her child to therapies 3 times a week, and earns an income with her part-time work schedule. The family of two has limited support from their family and on financial stability and wishes to seek household items from kind donors as they settle into their new home in a rental flat. To uplift the family and allowing them to settle better into their new place, they are looking to get some kitchen items - pots & pans, spatula & ladle, cutleries, and an air fryer. They are also open to receive second-hand items that are Halal from kind donors, as they are from a Muslim family. Thank you!
